thread.title: Shia LaBeouf abused Texas cop while being arrested for public intoxication
thread.title_full: Shia LaBeouf abused Texas cop while being arrested for public intoxication | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Shia LaBeouf abused Texas cop while being arrested for public intoxication
text:
Other Articles Study sheds light on culinary habits of Stonehenge builders 'Fantasy Island' to get reboot with female protagonist Leonardo DiCaprio to make movie on Volkswagen scandal Shia LaBeouf, who was recently arrested for public intoxication in Texas, abused a cop and threatened him.
Police reported that the 29-year-old claimed that he was a member of the National Guard, and said “do whatever the f**k you gotta do!” TMZ reported.
The actor, who was in Austin to attend a music festival, ran down 6th Street and jaywalked in front of police.
LaBeouf was handcuffed and placed under arrest for public intoxication.
 15, 2015 12:30 am
